tool_description: Unlock a treasure trove of miscellaneous data from the captivating world of Final Fantasy XIV with our dedicated API. Dive into a wealth of game-related information, from item details to quest data and more. Elevate your gaming experience, build innovative tools, or simply satisfy your curiosity by tapping into this comprehensive source of FFXIV data.
name: FFXIV Misc Data
title: FFXIV Misc Data

api_list.name: FFXIV Dialogue List
api_list.description:
List of Dialogue from FFXIV. Pagination available

Data may not be up to date

api_list.name: FFXIV Dialogue Detail
api_list.description: Get details on a single dialogue by using the "code" parameter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ffxiv-misc-data.p.rapidapi.com/ffxiv/dialogue/6Dgp1fayDmVPxG7eqyE0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ffxiv-misc-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ffxiv-misc-data.p.rapidapi.com/ffxiv/dialogue/{code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ffxiv-misc-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Weapons V1 Detail
